chapter_8.title: Items for the Journey
chapter_8.description: A comprehensive catalog of the tools, medicines, and artifacts a Trainer can buy, find, and use on their adventure.

trainer_pack_bundles.description: Pre-packaged kits for various lifestyles, often included with a Trainer's Origin. (Prices are for purchasing the kits whole).

list.name: Traveler’s Pack
list.contents: Collapsible tent, tarp, sleeping bag, pocket knife, solar flashlight, compass, waterproof matches, water bottle, compression sack.

list.name: Medical Field Kit
list.contents: Pain relievers, antihistamines, cold/flu relievers, electrolyte tablets, antiseptic solution and gel, medical tape, slings, bandages, gauze, stitch strips, and various tools like scissors and tweezers.

list.name: Studious Pack
list.contents: Solar charger, universal adapter, memory stick, binder, folders, notebooks, pencils, pens, and a backpack.

list.name: Miscreant's Pack
list.contents: Solar charger, universal adapter, memory sticks, lock picks, multi-head screwdriver, crowbar, and other tools for infiltration.

list.name: Cooking Kit
list.contents: Portable electric stove, cast iron pan, pot with lid, water purifier, cutting board, and various utensils.

list.name: Fishing Kit
list.contents: Telescoping fishing rod, spare reel lines, assorted hooks, assorted bobbers, sinkers, assorted lures, and a tackle box.

list.name: Grooming Kit
list.contents: Electronic trimmer, combs, brushes, scissors, clippers, nail file, soap, and shampoo.

list.name: Potion
list.effect: Heals 10 HP.

list.name: Super Potion
list.effect: Heals 20 HP.

list.name: Hyper Potion
list.effect: Heals 30 HP.

list.name: Max Potion
list.effect: Heals a Pokémon to their Max HP.

list.name: Full Restore
list.effect: Heals to Max HP and cures all status ailments.

status_heals.description: Items that cure specific status ailments.

list.name: Antidote
list.effect: Cures Poison and Badly Poisoned.

list.name: Paralyze Heal
list.effect: Cures Paralysis.

list.name: Awakening
list.effect: Cures Sleep.

list.name: Burn Heal
list.effect: Cures Burned.

list.name: Ice Heal
list.effect: Cures Frozen.

list.name: Full Heal
list.effect: Cures all status ailments.

berries.description: Natural remedies Pokémon can hold and consume automatically as a free action when their condition is met.

list.name: Oran Berry
list.effect: When HP drops below half, consume to heal 5 HP.

list.name: Sitrus Berry
list.effect: When HP drops below half, consume to heal 12 HP.

list.name: Pecha Berry
list.effect: Consume immediately when Poisoned to be cured.

list.name: Cheri Berry
list.effect: Consume immediately when Paralyzed to be cured.

list.name: Chesto Berry
list.effect: Consume immediately when put to Sleep to be cured.

list.name: Rawst Berry
list.effect: Consume immediately when Burned to be cured.

list.name: Aspear Berry
list.effect: Consume immediately when Frozen to be cured.

list.name: Lum Berry
list.effect: Consume immediately when inflicted with any status ailment to be cured.

list.name: Revive
list.effect: Restores a fainted Pokémon to half of its max HP.

list.name: Max Revive
list.effect: Restores a fainted Pokémon to its full max HP.

held_items.title: Held Items
held_items.description: A Pokémon can hold one item to gain an advantage in battle.

type_enhancing_items.name: Type-Enhancing Items
type_enhancing_items.description: These items add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of moves of the corresponding type.

choice_items.name: Choice Items
choice_items.description: Greatly boost one stat but lock the user into the first move they select for 3 minutes.

list.name: Choice Band
list.effect: Increases the user's Strength by 2.

list.name: Choice Specs
list.effect: Increases the user's Special by 2.

list.name: Choice Scarf
list.effect: Increases the user's Dexterity by 2.

evolutionary_items.title: Evolutionary Items
evolutionary_items.description: Rare items used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

elemental_stones.name: Elemental Stones
elemental_stones.description: Radioactive stones that induce evolution in specific species when touched.

trade_evolution_items.name: Trade-Evolution Items
trade_evolution_items.description: Items that trigger evolution when the Pokémon holding them is traded.
